title: Executive Order 9111-Amendment of Section 3 of Executive Order No. 8802 of June 25, 1941, Establishing the Committee on Fair Employment Practice
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and the statutes, section 3 of Executive Order No. 8802 of June 25, 1941, establishing the Committee on Fair Employment Practice, as amended by Executive Order No. 8823 of July 18, 1941, is hereby further amended to provide that the Committee shall consist of a chairman and six other members.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 9111-Amendment of Section 3 of Executive Order No. 8802 of June 25, 1941, Establishing the Committee on Fair Employment Practice Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368049
